title: Micro USB Host Mode Cable/OTG Cable for Andriod Smart Phones and Tablets
features: The Item is Brand New Top of the line, Straight micro USB B male to USB 2.0 A Female OTG Data Host Cable.
Connect USB flash drives, keyboards, mice and more to smart phones, tablets, and laptops with USB Host Support Mode Feature.
Functions depended on the device's operating system and applications
Compatible with Google Nexus 7, Motorola Xoom, Samsung Galaxy S2/SII/i9100, SGH-T989, Nokia N900/N810, and any other with USB Host Support Mode Features.
description: USB 2.0 A Female To Micro Male Adapter Cable (Micro Host Mode OTG ) for Google Nexus 7, Motorola Xoom, Samsung Galaxy S2/SII/i9100, SGH-T989, Nokia N900/N810, and any other with USB Host Support Mode Features. This USB Host adapter cable allows you to connect a camera, USB memory stick, USB memory card reader, mouse or a keyboard to your Tablet and Android smart phone. (some standard USB devices may not function if they consume too much power) - By using this cable, your Tablet / Smartphone can download all the photos from your camera directly, without having to transfer the photos to your computer first. - PC-free back up of videos and photos from your Internet Tablet to an external memory stick in a convenient way. - Connect to a keyboard or a mouse or a combination mouse/keyboard for easier control of your Internet Tablet. - This cable is used to connect your micro-B USB Port of your Internet Tablet or Smart phone to the USB Type A plug of your compatible USB device.
